data.name: Best Intruder
data.detailed_description:
Best Intruder is a space adventure shooter in which you play as the leader of a spaceship, travel through billions of planets in the galaxy, choose the planet you see fit, and its occupation. During the occupation process, you need to gradually advance from the outer periphery of the planetary system inward, defend your stronghold, break through the obstacles of the enemy, and finally take all the planets in your pocket.

The planets in the game are randomly generated, and different people can find completely different types of planets in the game.
The gameplay in defense mode is similar to a tower defense game, you need to acquire different types of raw materials in the game, build a defense system around the mothership, and at the same time you can drive a variety of different fighters to defeat the enemy in first-person or third-person perspective , and when you successfully capture the galaxy, you may encounter incoming enemies, which also require you to fight.

Get on your ship now and start the adventure!
data.about_the_game:
Best Intruder is a space adventure shooter in which you play as the leader of a spaceship, travel through billions of planets in the galaxy, choose the planet you see fit, and its occupation. During the occupation process, you need to gradually advance from the outer periphery of the planetary system inward, defend your stronghold, break through the obstacles of the enemy, and finally take all the planets in your pocket.

The planets in the game are randomly generated, and different people can find completely different types of planets in the game.
The gameplay in defense mode is similar to a tower defense game, you need to acquire different types of raw materials in the game, build a defense system around the mothership, and at the same time you can drive a variety of different fighters to defeat the enemy in first-person or third-person perspective , and when you successfully capture the galaxy, you may encounter incoming enemies, which also require you to fight.

data.short_description: A 3D sci-fi flight shooting game based on the entire galaxy as the background, a huge open universe, you can drive a fighter to cut grass infinitely, guard the space base, advance layer by layer, and finally take the entire galaxy in your pocket.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i7-10700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
